speaker: CHARMIAN
text_entry: SCENE IV. Athens. A room in MARK ANTONY's house.

speaker: CHARMIAN
text_entry: Enter MARK ANTONY and OCTAVIA

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Nay, nay, Octavia, not only that,--

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: That were excusable, that, and thousands more

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Of semblable import,--but he hath waged

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: New wars 'gainst Pompey; made his will, and read it

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: To public ear:

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Spoke scantly of me: when perforce he could not

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: But pay me terms of honour, cold and sickly

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: He vented them; most narrow measure lent me:

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: When the best hint was given him, he not took't,

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Or did it from his teeth.

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: O my good lord,

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: Believe not all; or, if you must believe,

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: Stomach not all. A more unhappy lady,

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: If this division chance, ne'er stood between,

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: Praying for both parts:

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: The good gods me presently,

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: When I shall pray, 'O bless my lord and husband!'

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: Undo that prayer, by crying out as loud,

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: 'O, bless my brother!' Husband win, win brother,

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: Prays, and destroys the prayer; no midway

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: 'Twixt these extremes at all.

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Gentle Octavia,

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Let your best love draw to that point, which seeks

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Best to preserve it: if I lose mine honour,

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: I lose myself: better I were not yours

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Than yours so branchless. But, as you requested,

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Yourself shall go between 's: the mean time, lady,

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: I'll raise the preparation of a war

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Shall stain your brother: make your soonest haste;

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: So your desires are yours.

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: Thanks to my lord.

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: The Jove of power make me most weak, most weak,

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: Your reconciler! Wars 'twixt you twain would be

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: As if the world should cleave, and that slain men

speaker: OCTAVIA
text_entry: Should solder up the rift.

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: When it appears to you where this begins,

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Turn your displeasure that way: for our faults

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Can never be so equal, that your love

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Can equally move with them. Provide your going;

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Choose your own company, and command what cost

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Your heart has mind to.

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Exeunt
